events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request because the customer is asking for money back due to receiving the wrong item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 78451236 and I have attached a photo showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the case is now resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting support.
